meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Carolyn Riegle Pranjal Vachaspati Ellen Corrigan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7347.

div.div:
Pranjal Vachaspati game 1.
Bible book-themed categories for all three rounds.

td.p: Carolyn Riegle, a pediatrician from Norfolk, Virginia
Pranjal Vachaspati, a Ph.D. student originally from Shaker Heights, Ohio
Ellen Corrigan, a law clerk from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania (whose 3-day cash winnings total $40,000)

tr.td: THESE AREN'T BIBLE BOOKS
DUDE-ERONOMY
JOB, NOT JOB
FIRST, QUEENS
ADAPTATIONS 5
SYNONYMS 1 & 2
